Class TableView1

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • view.TableView1
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILocalization, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class TableView1
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements ILocalization
    Klasa koja predstavlja prikaz tabele koja je otovrena u tabu i radnom delu. Sadrzi podatke o modelu.
    Author:
    Zlatan, Milena, Svetlana, Jasmina
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
